title: Open-sourced blueprints for civilization
description: Using wikis and digital fabrication tools, TED Fellow Marcin Jakubowski is open-sourcing the blueprints for 50 farm machines, allowing anyone to build their own tractor or harvester from scratch. And that's only the first step in a project to write an instruction set for an entire self-sustaining village (starting cost: $10,000).
author: Marcin Jakubowski
keywords: TED, talks, TED Fellows, culture, open-source, technology, manufacturing
